oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-12-27 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 27, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer), guest performer Jean Shepard, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, Del Wood, and Randy Hughes. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1003rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Jean Shepard; Del Wood; Cowboy Copas; Randy Hughes
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cowboy Copas introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Cowboy Copas) -- Prince Albert commercial (June Carter, Cowboy Copas) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Cowboy Copas introduces Jean Shepard -- Just Another Girl (Jean Shepard) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Del Wood -- Raggin' The Keys (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Cowboy Copas announce his tour schedule -- A World That's Real (Cowboy Copas, Randy Hughes) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Cowboy Copas) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Hughes, Randy, 1928-1963; Copas, Cowboy; Shepard, Jean, 1933-
